title: Terminator: Rewired
plot: In a future where AI rules the planet, a rogue engineer resurrects a forgotten Terminator to change the course of history.

title: Echoes of Vengeance
plot: A grieving detective starts hearing the voice of his murdered wife, guiding him to uncover a dark conspiracy.

title: Bond: Final Mission
plot: James Bond faces his greatest enemy yet—his own past—in a globe-spanning mission that threatens MI6 from within.

title: The Judge's Code
plot: A federal judge must choose between justice and family when her estranged brother is accused of cyberterrorism.

title: Love on Fifth Avenue
plot: A career-driven fashion editor and a struggling jazz pianist find unexpected love on New York’s most glamorous street.

title: Mockingbird Rising
plot: In a dystopian America, a young poet becomes the voice of a suppressed revolution through her forbidden verses.

title: The Narrator
plot: An unreliable narrator discovers that the characters in his novel are real—and they want to rewrite their ending.

title: Black Swan Returns
plot: Years after a tragic fall, a former prima ballerina must return to the stage to protect her protégé from a cursed role.

title: Diver Armor: Surviving The Water
plot: After a deep-sea mission goes wrong, an elite diver must survive alone in an experimental suit while secrets bubble to the surface.

title: Gravity Shift
plot: When Earth’s gravity begins to fluctuate, a rogue astrophysicist and a discredited pilot race to uncover the cause—and stop it.

title: Rambo: Last Bloodline
plot: John Rambo emerges from hiding when a secret child he never knew about is caught in the crossfire of a Central American cartel war.

title: Mission: Omega
plot: An elite team of operatives must infiltrate a rogue AI fortress before it launches the final phase of human extinction.
